resources.string: ¿Are you sure that you want reserve this flight?
¿What do u want to do with this reservation?
The origin city or the destination city are incorrect
Some field is empty, the email field is wrong write or the dates are incorrect
Paris is the capital of France and its most populous city. Capital of the Ile-de-France region, it is the only unicommunal department in the country.
Switzerland, officially the Swiss Confederation, is a landlocked country in Central Europe with a population of about 1,000. Switzerland is a federated republic of 26 states.
Tokyo, officially Tokyo Metropolis, is the de facto capital of Japan, located in the east center of the island of Honshu
Venice is a city located in northeastern Italy. It is also the capital of the Veneto region and the province of Venice.

Rome is an Italian city, capital of the Lazio region and of Italy. It is the most populous municipality in Italy and the third most populous in the European Union. It has been known since antiquity as the "Urbe". It is also called "The Eternal City".
London is the capital and largest city of England and the United Kingdom. It is situated on the banks of the River Thames.
Madrid is a municipality and a city in Spain, with the historical category of villa. It is the capital of the State and of the Community of Madrid. It is the most populated municipality in Spain.
Barcelona is a Spanish city, capital of the autonomous community of Catalonia, of the province of the same name and of the Barcelonés region. With a population of 1 664 162 inhabitants in 2020.
